articles.author: News18
articles.title: Donald Trump Arrives at Atlanta Jail for Mug Shot, Booking in Election Case
articles.description: Former President Trump's jailhouse arrival and mug shot in a wide-ranging criminal case related to overturning 2020 election defeat
articles.content:
Former US President Donald Trump arrived at an Atlanta jailhouse on Thursday evening to turn himself in and have his mug shot taken as part of a wide-ranging criminal case stemming from his attempts to overturn his 2020 election defeat in Georgia.
Tr... [4624 chars]

articles.author: Sky News
articles.title: US politics latest: Donald Trump booked at Fulton County jail on charges relating to 2020 election
articles.description: Former president Donald Trump is to be booked on more than a dozen charges - all concerning his alleged efforts to overturn the 2020 election result in the state of Georgia. It is expected that Trump will have a mugshot taken.
articles.content:
Trump officially released
Donald Trump has been released from Fulton County jail after surrendering less than half an hour ago.
It means the US president has been booked and has paid his $200,000 bond.
He will have been fingerprinted, weighed and had... [375 chars]

articles.author: Newsweek
articles.title: Trump Surrenders in Georgia for Historic Fourth Arrest
articles.description: Thursday night's booking in Fulton County was the fourth time that the former president has been arrested this year.
articles.content:
Former President Donald Trump has been arrested in Georgia and booked on criminal charges, accused of attempting to overturn the outcome of the 2020 presidential election.
Trump turned himself in to authorities at Atlanta's Fulton County Jail on Thur... [4393 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s jail spectacle is historic, but it won’t harm him politically
articles.description: The most significant events may be what happens far away from the Fulton county jail, as Trump continues to be the GOP frontrunner
articles.content: One by one this week, they’ve made their way to 901 Rice Street, the address of the notorious Fulton county jail. Lawyers, government officials, a former state party chair and others have all surrendered to authorities after being charged as part of ... [4449 chars]

articles.author: POLITICO
articles.title: Trump surrenders at Georgia jail in election case
articles.description: A grand jury in Georgia indicted Trump and 18 others last week on racketeering and other charges.
articles.content: Trump’s surrender is distinct from the other three times the former president has been booked as a criminal defendant this year. In those cases, Trump turned himself in at a courthouse rather than a jail, and he did not have a mug shot taken. But in ... [2306 chars]

articles.title: Trump legal brief: Trump turns himself in for arrest in Atlanta
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump turned himself in Thursday for arrest and processing at Atlanta’s Fulton County jail after being indicted along with 18 others for attempting to overturn the 2020 election results in Georgia.

articles.author: The Intercept
articles.title: GOP Moves to Oust Georgia Prosecutor Who Indicted Trump
articles.description: The Georgia prosecutor who indicted Trump, Atlanta District Attorney Fani Willis, is being targeted by the GOP for removal under a new law.
articles.content:
A little over a week after a prosecutor in Georgia indicted former President Donald Trump for trying to overturn the results of the state’s 2020 presidential election, Republicans said they will use a new law to remove her from office.

articles.title: Nearly 13M viewers watched Fox News' GOP debate without Trump
articles.description: Nearly 13 million people watched the Republican presidential debate on either Fox News or Fox Business. Frontrunner Donald Trump skipped the event in lieu of a taped interview with Tucker Carlson.
